text: Define the structure of the micro-array data structure (Start of data processing)
Load the data scanned from the array machine.  This also includes joining the data with the sample identifiers.
Background correction. By default the local background correction is selected.
Coefficient of variation: This involves two main approaches: 1) Select CV cut off. 2) Selecting the number of  technical replicates. 3) Excluding the replicates with a bad CV
Normalisation to handle mean variance dependence
For analysing the MFI results check on the visual plots included under this section
All data in different sections can be downloaded using the download button.
